channel.title: Multifactor Authentication (MFA) :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Multifactor Authentication (MFA) Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Description: Explain the very basic concept of MFA. Also, explain the difference between a Factor and an Authenticator. Why is this here?: ‘- External Oktane 2023: 20% of respondents placed “Multi-factor Authentication” under “IAM Fundamentals”. After discussions with employees (and probably customers as well) there is a misunderstanding of what is a “Factor” and what is an Authenticator".
